cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("redact")

	REDACT("src.password", "password:").SKIP_IF_UNLICENSED(true).TRACE_REDACT(true)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: redact
processors:
  - redact:
      tag: redact_src_password_dc3b8c3a
      field: src.password
      patterns:
        - 'password:'
      skip_if_unlicensed: true
      trace_redact: true
